R add 3 0110011 000 0000000
R and 3 0110011 111 0000000
R or 3 0110011 110 0100000
R sll 3 0110011 001 0000000
R slt 3 0110011 010 0000000
R sra 3 0110011 011 0000000
R srl 3 0110011 100 0000000
R sub 3 0110011 101 0100000
R xor 3 0110011 110 0000000
R mul 3 0110011 000 0000000
R div 3 0110011 100 0000000
R rem 3 00110011 110 0000000
I addi 3 0010011 000 
I andi 3 0010011 111 
I ori 3 0010011 110 
I lb 3 0000011 000 
I ld 3 0000011 011 
I lh 3 0000011 001 
I lw 3 0000011 010 
I jalr 2 1100111 000 
S sb 2 0100011 000 
S sw 2 0100011 010 
S sd 2 0100011 011 
S sh 2 0100011 001 
SB beq 3 1100011 000 
SB bne 3 1100011 001 
SB bge 3 1100011 101 
SB blt 3 1100011 100 
U auipc 2 0010111 000 
U lui 2 0110111 000 
UJ jal 2 1101111 000
